name: FullBattery
0:
”Alexa, ask Full Battery to tell me the status of my watch battery”
”Alexa, ask Full Battery to tell me if my watch is fully charged”
”Alexa, ask Full Battery what's my account email address”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: full battery
des:
Have Alexa report the status of your smartwatch and do not depend on the app anymore!

You can ask Alexa if your smartwatch is charged or not, or what is its battery status. Alexa will connect to the cloud and tell you all you need, so you won't have to open the app over and over again.

This skill is compatible with the following smartwatches:

- Wear OS 3.0 devices
- Tizen devices
- Fitbit Sense
- Fitbit Ionic
- Fibit Versa family devices

Take into account that in order to use this skill correctly, you have to install the Full Battery app for Wear OS 3.0, Tizen or Fitbit devices and register in the Full Battery web application.

For Wear OS 3.0 devices, go to: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rjberru.fullbattery&hl=en

For Tizen devices, go to: https://galaxystore.samsung.com/geardetail/gsqV36k93Y

For Fitbit Versa 3 and Fibit Sense, go to: https://gallery.fitbit.com/details/16163110-dfee-4cdd-bca5-edf80bd918b9

For Fitbit Ionic, Fitbit Versa Lite, Fitbit Versa and Fitbit Versa 2, go to: https://gallery.fitbit.com/details/a097edc3-a171-4a4c-8962-2110e7dfbeaa

Once the app is installed, you have to enable the Cloud integration feature.
